articles.title: ISL: Punjab decide to pay franchise fee, will play home games in Delhi - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Panaji: Punjab FC are the newest entrants to the Indian Super League (ISL) but the I-League champions won’t play their home games at the Tau Devi Lal .

articles.author: Mihir Vasavda
articles.title: Hockey to trial penalty corner rule change to ‘protect’ defenders, may end drag flick - The Indian Express
articles.description: New rule to be trialled says the ball must travel outside the 5 metre dotted line — which is beyond the 'D' — before it can be played back into the ‘D’ for a shot on goal.
